# Device Tree Blob (.dtb) files can be placed into this directory
#
# The file name and path is affected by two global env variables. 
# global.vmxmodel
# global.vmxkernel

# Example:
# 1. Configuration
barebox@Voipac VMX53:/ cat /env/config
#!/bin/sh
...

global.vmxmodel=557
global.vmxkernel=3.12

...

# 2. DTB File name and location
/env/dtb/3.12/imx53-vmx53-557.dtb
